text: Hi, how are you today?
I'm good. YOu/
I'm doing fine. I'm talking to people today about donating to an organization very special to me. Are you interested?
Which organization would that be?
Save the Children. They aim to provide aid in the form of relief in developing countries. Have you donated to a similar charity before?
I'm familiar with the charity but have never donated to that one before.
Have you felt inclined to donate to any charity before? If so, what sort of charity?
I donate to breast cancer awareness, red cross and some locale charities
Are you able to set aside a small amount today for Save the Children?
I don't think so.  I like to stick with my normal donations
If you do change your mind, you can donate a portion of your payment for this task. It can be any amount from $0 to $2.
No thanks.  It's a good cause but I won't be donating at this time
Thank you. What is the name of the breast cancer awareness charity that you donate to?
It's Susan G. Komen. The big one.  It's a great cause
What is your primary mode of donation? Do you donate online, at events, or otherwise?
Both.  I also participate in awareness walks and promotions
Do you have a personal connection to the cause?
Yes. Family members and friends have gone through this.
I'm sorry to hear that. I lost my grandmother to breast cancer and lymphoma.
that's sad.  Sorry to hear that
